DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of the study is to examine connections between muscle tones, strength and function after stroke.
DOC.brief_title: Muscle Tone Changes in Acute Stroke According to Brain Injury
DOC.detailed_description: Measurements are intended to repeat every two days in acute phase to discover possible changes in tone and strength in arm and leg muscles.
DOC.criteria: unilateral decline in the arm or leg muscle strength unwilling to take part on the trial not conscious no differences between muscle strength on the right and left side
